title: Navigate forwards to a collapsed disclosure button in reading mode
task: navigate forwards to collapsed disclosure button
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the first disclosure button
instructions: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the navigation region. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
assertion3: State of the button (collapsed) is conveyed

title: Navigate from an expanded disclosure button to a link in the associated dropdown in reading mode
task: navigate from expanded disclosure button to link in dropdown
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on the first disclosure button, and sets its state to expanded
instructions: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the navigation region, move into the button's associated list of links. Note: you may need to press certain commands (such as Down Arrow) multiple times to hear all information about the dropdown and link.
assertion1: Role of the dropdown ('list') is conveyed
assertion2: Number of items in the dropdown (4) is conveyed
assertion3: Role of the first item in the dropdown ('link') is conveyed
assertion4: Name of the first item in the dropdown ('Overview') is conveyed
